tool_description: Creates behavioral baselines for user accounts by analyzing historical patterns of activity, transactions, and access behaviors.

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days of historical data to analyze (30-365)

include_weekday_patterns.description: Whether to include day-of-week patterns in baseline

include_time_patterns.description: Whether to include time-of-day patterns in baseline

include_transaction_patterns.description: Whether to include transaction patterns in baseline

include_device_patterns.description: Whether to include device usage patterns in baseline

include_location_patterns.description: Whether to include location patterns in baseline

minimum_data_points.description: Minimum number of data points required for reliable baseline (5-100)

update_existing.description: Whether to update existing baseline or create new one

error_messages: Invalid account_id: Account must exist and have sufficient historical data.
Invalid analysis_period_days: Must be between 30 and 365 days.
Invalid minimum_data_points: Must be between 5 and 100.
Invalid confidence_threshold: Must be between 0.5 and 1.0.
Insufficient historical data: Account must have minimum required data points for reliable baseline creation.
Baseline creation failed: Unable to establish reliable patterns from available data.
usage: Provide account_id and configure analysis parameters. The tool analyzes historical account behavior to create a comprehensive behavioral baseline for anomaly detection.

baseline_id.description: Unique identifier for the created baseline

creation_timestamp.description: When the baseline was created (ISO 8601 format)

data_points_analyzed.description: Number of historical data points used

baseline_confidence.description: Overall confidence score for the baseline (0-1)

typical_transaction_amount_range.description: Array with min and max typical transaction amounts

baseline_summary.description: Summary of key behavioral patterns identified
